Masterlist

title: Boring (Part 4) (Peter Parker x Reader)
body:
Part 4

Pairing: Peter Parker x Reader

Warnings:

A/N: Hey guys! I’d just like to say thank you to all the support I’ve received so far! I’ve only had this blog for about a month, so it means a lot!

I’d also like to let you know that if you want to be tagged in either this series or all of my writing, send me a message or ask and I’ll add you!

TAG LIST OPEN

REQUESTS OPEN

–

When Y/N woke up, the white nearly blinded her.

Squinting, she observed the room the best she could, trying to remember the last thing that happened. She had been at he library, and then… Then the explosion. The shelves shook and fell, the air filled with smoke, and… and…

That’s where it all blurred.

“You’re awake!” a voice said. Y/N turned to see her mother, computer in her lap.

Typical.

“How… What..?” It was only when Y/N tried talking that she realized how raw her throat was–likely from the smoke. Her head was pounding and she felt a bit sore, but other than that, she felt perfectly fine.

“You know that superhero that lives around here? Spider-Man?” her mother asked, looking up from the screen.

Y/N nodded.

“He pulled you out of the building,” she said, voice unemotional. “You were the last one in there. Everyone else was able to run, but because the shelves fell on you, you couldn’t get out.”

Silence laid heavy in the room.

“He saved my life,” Y/N mumbled.

Her mother nodded. “He took you straight to the hospital. Luckily, there’s no permanent damage. You might be coughing for a while, but that’s it.”

The way she said it all made it sound so small. So matter-of-fact and unimportant–just a minor inconvenience that had already passed.

But she had almost died.

Y/N L/N had almost burned to death in a library, had almost ceased existing, and here her own mother was, not shedding a tear.

And for that moment, as her mother turned back to her computer, Y/N had to wonder if anyone would have cared if she really had died.

–

Y/N returned to school on Monday, as if nothing ever happened. She had some bruises that ached, some cuts still covered in bandaids, but no one bothered to ask her about any of it.

At lunch, her and MJ sat at their normal spot. Lunch was better now that she had MJ. Sometimes, they’d sit and complain about teachers, talk about how stupid other students could be, or sometimes, MJ would just draw and Y/N would read. They’d be in their own worlds, but even then they had each other. As they sat, Y/N spoke.

“So I kinda almost died.”

MJ didn’t even flinch as she plopped her sketchbook onto the table in a very MJ-like matter. “Yeah?”

“Yep. Spider-Man saved me.”

She gave a small hum. “Well, for what it’s worth, I’m glad you didn’t die because I’d have to go back to those losers.” She jerked her head toward Peter and Ned.

Y/N chuckled. “I guess we both have Spider-Man to thank for saving us from those awful fates.”

MJ gave a small smile, lifting her carton of milk. “To Spider-Man.”

Y/N grinned, lifting her own. “To Spider-Man.”

–

Peter hadn’t been able to get his mind off of Y/N, with was fairly reasonable based on his latest discovery.

Y/N L/N was his soulmate.

Part of him felt that he knew it all along, the other still sat in disbelief, waiting for someone to jump out and yell “Gotcha!”

But that didn’t happen.

He had looked down at that matching mark and panicked–even more than he had been before. The life of his soulmate was literally in his own hands, and he didn’t want to lose her.

It was only after he knew she was safe at the hospital that his mind fully began to register the facts. His soulmate had almost died. He saved his soulmate’s life.

His soulmate freaking HATED him.

And so, Monday at school, he realized he had two options. One: talk to her. Risk being even more hated and ruin everything. Or two: ignore it. Just keep living like normal and avoid her at all costs and hope fate found a way to bring them together.

He was seriously considering that second option and just never telling anyone what he had discovered, but as school let out that day and he put on his Spider-Man suit, he realized that maybe, just maybe, he had a third option…

–

Boring.

That was the word Y/N would use to describe her life up to this point. Others she would use included pointless, lacking, and unwanted. But all in all, the best word was still that one. Boring.

Yes, she lived in New York City, the Big Apple. She went to nice schools and got to learn some cool stuff. But she heard other people’s stories, the experiences they had, and she couldn’t help but feel inadequate.

Her mother never paid attention to her longer than a minute at a time, eyes glued to that life-consuming device. Her father had been out of the picture for as long as she cared to remember. Her cousins and family lived much too far to travel, and, well, MJ was still the only person who willingly talk to her. It didn’t help that her soulmate didn’t bother to present himself.

Gazing in the mirror, she knew she even looked boring. Hair hardly done and makeup at the minimal. Clothes just nice enough to be looked over in a crowd. And her eyes were brown.

Brown is freaking boring.

And as she laid in bed, every single one of these thoughts were running through her head on repeat. She wanted something to change, but that pessimistic part of her knew it wouldn’t. She was destined to be boring.

All of those thoughts were chased away with the sound of tapping on her window.

—

A/N: Sorry this chapter is kinda a disaster but whatever

Boring Tag list:

@tom-hollands-eyelash

Tag list:

@fireboltrose7559

And so, Monday at school, he realized he had two options. One: talk to her. Risk being even more hated and ruin everything. Or two: ignore it. Just keep living like normal and avoid her at all costs and hope fate found a way to bring them together.

He was seriously considering that second option and just never telling anyone what he had discovered, but as school let out that day and he put on his Spider-Man suit, he realized that maybe, just maybe, he had a third option…

Boring.

That was the word Y/N would use to describe her life up to this point. Others she would use included pointless, lacking, and unwanted. But all in all, the best word was still that one. Boring.

Yes, she lived in New York City, the Big Apple. She went to nice schools and got to learn some cool stuff. But she heard other people’s stories, the experiences they had, and she couldn’t help but feel inadequate.

Her cousins and family lived much too far to travel, and, well, MJ was still the only person who willingly talk to her. It didn’t help that her soulmate didn’t bother to present himself.

Gazing in the mirror, she knew she even looked boring. Hair hardly done and makeup at the minimal. Clothes just nice enough to be looked over in a crowd. And her eyes were brown.

Brown is freaking boring.

And as she laid in bed, every single one of these thoughts were running through her head on repeat. She wanted something to change, but that pessimistic part of her knew it wouldn’t. She was destined to be boring.

blog.name: drpepperhateblog
blog.title: I Really Don't Like Dr Pepper
blog.description: Media analysis, gaming, political talk, whatever I find interesting at the moment. You are entitled to your opinion. Unless your opinion involves anything positive about Dr. Pepper. That is unacceptable.

summary: Continuing my Cloak and Dagger liveblog! I have no idea if this was done on purpose by the writers or not, but the hoodie Tandy...
caption:
Continuing my Cloak and Dagger liveblog!

I have no idea if this was done on purpose by the writers or not, but the hoodie Tandy wears is black, which is reminiscent of what Tyrone wore as a child (which must be meant to be his “cloak” as I talked about earlier).

So at this point where Tandy is all alone and depressed, her comfort choice of clothing happens to be symbolic of her future partner’s powers, and I found it to be a cute detail. Not to mention that what saved her life in the accident was reaching out into darkness, so she might associate darkness with safety.

blog.title: Thor ran into my knife.
blog.description: lex; 25; queer; he/him; slytherin; infp :: dc; marvel; star trek; fma

summary: i'm still hardcore on my loki bullshit right? diving deep on ao3. and there's a few different fics where loki is sick in both...
body: i’m still hardcore on my loki bullshit right? diving deep on ao3. and there’s a few different fics where loki is sick in both body and mind from not having his jotun needs met. and the authors came up with somewhat convoluted reasons that would do both. and i’m like i love this but… celiac. he has celiac disease. wheat wouldn’t grow on jontunheim in ten million years, and it checks all the boxes. loki has celiac.

reblog.comment: i’m still hardcore on my loki bullshit right? diving deep on ao3. and there’s a few different fics where loki is sick in both body and mind from not having his jotun needs met. and the authors came up with somewhat convoluted reasons that would do both. and i’m like i love this but… celiac. he has celiac disease. wheat wouldn’t grow on jontunheim in ten million years, and it checks all the boxes. loki has celiac.

trail.content_raw: i’m still hardcore on my loki bullshit right? diving deep on ao3. and there’s a few different fics where loki is sick in both body and mind from not having his jotun needs met. and the authors came up with somewhat convoluted reasons that would do both. and i’m like i love this but… celiac. he has celiac disease. wheat wouldn’t grow on jontunheim in ten million years, and it checks all the boxes. loki has celiac.
trail.content: i’m still hardcore on my loki bullshit right? diving deep on ao3. and there’s a few different fics where loki is sick in both body and mind from not having his jotun needs met. and the authors came up with somewhat convoluted reasons that would do both. and i’m like i love this but… celiac. he has celiac disease. wheat wouldn’t grow on jontunheim in ten million years, and it checks all the boxes. loki has celiac.

blog.title: unguibus et rostro
blog.description: ambra. twenties. aquarius. infp. hufflepuff. serial procrastinator. enjoys words, music, and fictional trainwrecks; passionate about feminism, coffee, and food. adam parrish is my sun and stars.

tags: essentially my brain is increasingly blurring the words 'thor' and 'thot'
and honestly? i think that's beautiful
summary: you wouldn’t BELIEVE how many times i’ve gone to type “thor: ragnarok” in my tags only to almost type “thot: ragnarok” but you...
body: you wouldn’t BELIEVE how many times i’ve gone to type “thor: ragnarok” in my tags only to almost type “thot: ragnarok” but you know what. U KNOW WHAT. it would still be a valid tag

reblog.comment: you wouldn’t BELIEVE how many times i’ve gone to type “thor: ragnarok” in my tags only to almost type “thot: ragnarok” but you know what. U KNOW WHAT. it would still be a valid tag

title: Time.
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2nSo8XC

by anotherblight

Steve was trapped, would always just be the man out of time. Losing a battle he could never hope to win as it slipped away, never to return.

tags: i don't want this to flop
summary: To celebrate that I’ve recently reached 3,500 followers, I decided to host my first writing challenge! I absolutely have no idea...
caption:
To celebrate that I’ve recently reached 3,500 followers, I decided to host my first writing challenge! I absolutely have no idea how I gained so many followers, but I’m happy you all decided to stick with me and follow my messy blog, reading and reviewing my fics, talking to me and being amazing. I hope many of you will participate in this challenge, because I’d love to read your amazing works!

Rules:

  • You don’t have to follow me (but it would be nice)
  • Reblog this post
  • Your fic must be minimum 700 words (no upper limit)
  • Please use read more link!
  • It can be a one shot or a series
  • It can be smut, fluff, angst, or all three. Your choice!
  • You can write for any character in the following fandoms: Marvel (MCU, netflix, or comics), Harry Potter, Star Wars, or Westworld. If you want to write for someone else, let me know and I’ll consider.
  • It doesn’t need to be an x reader fic. You can write for an OC or your favourite ships too, BUT no gross ships like incest or shipping an adult with a kid.
  • If you want to participate, send me an ask or a dm with one number and the character/ship you will writing for. Only one number per person. Once the prompt or au is gone it can be taken by someone else too, but only with a different character!
  • When you post the fic, tag me (if tumblr is acting up and you can’t tag me, send me the link via dm!)
  • Use the tag #bethswritingchallenge
  • Deadline for the challenge is 30th November! No rush. I want to you all have fun with this. If you write a multichapter fic, you only have to submit the first part before the deadline.
  • If you change your mind and you don’t want to participate or you just want to choose another promp or character, please send me a dm!
  • Every writer will get a review and a moodboard based on their fic
  • If you have any question, just let me know!

Prompts are under the cut:

  • AU

1. Florist / Tattoo artist | @reneeissancewrites with Rustle

2. Professor or teacher

3. College | @fortisfiliae with James Potter

4. Librarian | @padfootagain with Steve Rogers

5. Coffee Shop

6. Medieval fantasy

7. Prince / Princess

8. Arranged Marriage

9. Roommates

10. Soulmates | @thatfanficstuff with Tony Stark

11. Lumberjack

  • Movie AU (you can choose one scene, or rewrite the whole story. If you choose this one, use the movies only as an inspiraton! You can use the same scenes, but don’t rewrite the whole movie from line to line.)

12. 50 First Dates | @nessieaceman with Bucky 

13. The Notebook

14. 10 Things I Hate About You

15. La La Land

16. Beauty and the Beast

17. The Little Mermaid

18. Never Been Kissed

  • Tropes

19. Bed Sharing

20. Friends to lovers | @djbobbiedrake with Storm 

21. Rescue mission

22. 5+1 things (it can be 4+1 or 3+1 too) | @berrybucky with Stucky

23. Fake dating

  • Scenarios

24. Camping where it’s raining and freezing outside and they’re stealing each others’ blankets | @blackinnon-paradise with Blackinnon

25. A invites B for a dinner but it turns out A can’t cook. B offers them to teach how to cook, but A is very clumsy

26. It’s the middle of the night and A screams in their sleep, waking up B. A looks exhausted and B offers cuddles | @abdoesthething with Logan 

27. First date where person A or B (or both) is very nervous and keeps embarrassing themselves

28. Person A is hiding from the bad guys and kisses person B because it’s a good distraction | @hiswhiteknight with Steve Rogers, @wehaveabuck with Bucky 

29. There’s a thunderstorm and person A is terrified, so B is comforts them

30. The coffee shop is very crowded so person A and B is “forced” to share a table. A is not very happy because they needs to study/write/etc, but person B is too cute | @delos-mio with Thor

  • Quotes (the fic doesn’t have to contain the quote. It’s enough if it’s based on the quote!)

31. “The loneliest moment in someone’s life is when they are watching their whole world fall apart, and all they can do is stare blankly.” (F. Scott Fitzgerald)

32. “Angry, and half in love with her, and tremendously sorry, I turned away.” (F. Scott Fitzgerald) | @writefanficssometimes with Draco

33. “Don’t go where I can’t follow.” (J.R.R. Tolkien) | @gigglegirl77 with Steve Rogers

34. “Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise.” (Victor Hugo) | @humandronebarnes with Bucky 

35. “I can bear any pain as long as it has meaning.” (Haruki Murakami)

To celebrate that I’ve recently reached 3,500 followers, I decided to host my first writing challenge! I absolutely have no idea how I gained so many followers, but I’m happy you all decided to stick with me and follow my messy blog, reading and reviewing my fics, talking to me and being amazing. I hope many of you will participate in this challenge, because I’d love to read your amazing works!

Rules:

  • You don’t have to follow me (but it would be nice)

  • If you want to participate, send me an ask or a dm with one number and the character/ship you will writing for. Only one number per person. Once the prompt or au is gone it can be taken by someone else too, but only with a different character!
  • When you post the fic, tag me (if tumblr is acting up and you can’t tag me, send me the link via dm!)
  • Use the tag #bethswritingchallenge
  • Deadline for the challenge is 30th November! No rush. I want to you all have fun with this. If you write a multichapter fic, you only have to submit the first part before the deadline.
  • If you change your mind and you don’t want to participate or you just want to choose another promp or character, please send me a dm!
  • Every writer will get a review and a moodboard based on their fic
  • If you have any question, just let me know!

Prompts are under the cut:

25. A invites B for a dinner but it turns out A can’t cook. B offers them to teach how to cook, but A is very clumsy

27. First date where person A or B (or both) is very nervous and keeps embarrassing themselves

28. Person A is hiding from the bad guys and kisses person B because it’s a good distraction | @hiswhiteknight with Steve Rogers, @wehaveabuck with Bucky 

29. There’s a thunderstorm and person A is terrified, so B is comforts them

30. The coffee shop is very crowded so person A and B is “forced” to share a table. A is not very happy because they needs to study/write/etc, but person B is too cute | @delos-mio with Thor

  • Quotes (the fic doesn’t have to contain the quote. It’s enough if it’s based on the quote!)

31. “The loneliest moment in someone’s life is when they are watching their whole world fall apart, and all they can do is stare blankly.” (F. Scott Fitzgerald)

32. “Angry, and half in love with her, and tremendously sorry, I turned away.” (F. Scott Fitzgerald) | @writefanficssometimes with Draco

33. “Don’t go where I can’t follow.” (J.R.R. Tolkien) | @gigglegirl77 with Steve Rogers

34. “Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise.” (Victor Hugo) | @humandronebarnes with Bucky 

35. “I can bear any pain as long as it has meaning.” (Haruki Murakami)
trail.content:
To celebrate that I’ve recently reached 3,500 followers, I decided to host my first writing challenge! I absolutely have no idea how I gained so many followers, but I’m happy you all decided to stick with me and follow my messy blog, reading and reviewing my fics, talking to me and being amazing. I hope many of you will participate in this challenge, because I’d love to read your amazing works!

Rules:

  • You don’t have to follow me (but it would be nice)
  • Reblog this post
  • Your fic must be minimum 700 words (no upper limit)
  • Please use read more link!
  • It can be a one shot or a series
  • It can be smut, fluff, angst, or all three. Your choice!
  • You can write for any character in the following fandoms: Marvel (MCU, netflix, or comics), Harry Potter, Star Wars, or Westworld. If you want to write for someone else, let me know and I’ll consider.
  • It doesn’t need to be an x reader fic. You can write for an OC or your favourite ships too, BUT no gross ships like incest or shipping an adult with a kid.
  • If you want to participate, send me an ask or a dm with one number and the character/ship you will writing for. Only one number per person. Once the prompt or au is gone it can be taken by someone else too, but only with a different character!
  • When you post the fic, tag me (if tumblr is acting up and you can’t tag me, send me the link via dm!)
  • Use the tag #bethswritingchallenge
  • Deadline for the challenge is 30th November! No rush. I want to you all have fun with this. If you write a multichapter fic, you only have to submit the first part before the deadline.
  • If you change your mind and you don’t want to participate or you just want to choose another promp or character, please send me a dm!
  • Every writer will get a review and a moodboard based on their fic
  • If you have any question, just let me know!

Prompts are under the cut:

  • AU

1. Florist / Tattoo artist | @reneeissancewrites with Rustle

2. Professor or teacher

3. College | @fortisfiliae with James Potter

4. Librarian | @padfootagain with Steve Rogers

5. Coffee Shop

6. Medieval fantasy

7. Prince / Princess

8. Arranged Marriage

9. Roommates

10. Soulmates | @thatfanficstuff with Tony Stark

11. Lumberjack

  • Movie AU (you can choose one scene, or rewrite the whole story. If you choose this one, use the movies only as an inspiraton! You can use the same scenes, but don’t rewrite the whole movie from line to line.)

12. 50 First Dates | @nessieaceman with Bucky 

13. The Notebook

14. 10 Things I Hate About You

15. La La Land

16. Beauty and the Beast

17. The Little Mermaid

18. Never Been Kissed

  • Tropes

19. Bed Sharing

20. Friends to lovers | @djbobbiedrake with Storm 

21. Rescue mission

22. 5+1 things (it can be 4+1 or 3+1 too) | @berrybucky with Stucky

23. Fake dating

  • Scenarios

24. Camping where it’s raining and freezing outside and they’re stealing each others’ blankets | @blackinnon-paradise with Blackinnon

25. A invites B for a dinner but it turns out A can’t cook. B offers them to teach how to cook, but A is very clumsy

26. It’s the middle of the night and A screams in their sleep, waking up B. A looks exhausted and B offers cuddles | @abdoesthething with Logan 

27. First date where person A or B (or both) is very nervous and keeps embarrassing themselves

28. Person A is hiding from the bad guys and kisses person B because it’s a good distraction | @hiswhiteknight with Steve Rogers, @wehaveabuck with Bucky 

29. There’s a thunderstorm and person A is terrified, so B is comforts them

30. The coffee shop is very crowded so person A and B is “forced” to share a table. A is not very happy because they needs to study/write/etc, but person B is too cute | @delos-mio with Thor

  • Quotes (the fic doesn’t have to contain the quote. It’s enough if it’s based on the quote!)

31. “The loneliest moment in someone’s life is when they are watching their whole world fall apart, and all they can do is stare blankly.” (F. Scott Fitzgerald)

32. “Angry, and half in love with her, and tremendously sorry, I turned away.” (F. Scott Fitzgerald) | @writefanficssometimes with Draco

33. “Don’t go where I can’t follow.” (J.R.R. Tolkien) | @gigglegirl77 with Steve Rogers

34. “Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise.” (Victor Hugo) | @humandronebarnes with Bucky 

35. “I can bear any pain as long as it has meaning.” (Haruki Murakami)

Prompts are under the cut:

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Rebound
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2nPm96u

by capsquartet

After a rocky relationship, Natasha confides in Steve for relationship advice. After a bit of liquid courage, Steve finds himself becoming Natasha’s rebound, but he falls. He falls hard.

She doesn’t know what she wants from men anymore.

Words: 2801, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Captain America (Movies), Marvel Cinematic Universe, Marvel, Romanogers - Fandom, capwidow - Fandom, Stevenat - Fandom
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Steve Rogers, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Sam Wilson (Marvel), James “Bucky” Barnes, Tony Stark, Thor (Marvel), Loki (Marvel), Clint Barton, Bruce Banner, Pepper Potts, Maria Hill, Nick Fury
  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/Natasha Romanov
  • Additional Tags: romanogers - Freeform, Alternate Universe, Alternate Universe - Modern Setting


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2nPm96u
